name: Dirk Sools
description:
I made this for a project in school, but decided to upload it here.... For some reason. :P

(Edit) Changed status from Released to Prototype because it doesn't feel like a proper game.

CONTROLS

J + K are used to attack the enemy, they deal similar damage.

A + D are used to move the player from the left to right side of the screen.

Music and sound effects are from Undertale, Created by Toby Fox.

Designed and Programmed by me.

UPDATED:

Updated the files available to download, BYOB shouldn't be required to play the game.
